attributes.name: Chillwind Hatchet
attributes.description: "The cold blast of wind chilled the warrior to the bone, freezing her in her place."
attributes.parsed_description: "The cold blast of wind chilled the warrior to the bone, freezing her in her place."

attributes.name: Choking Gasp
attributes.description: "Smoke is a temperamental thing, always wafting this way and that. Learn to control it, and you can control the battlefield."
attributes.parsed_description: "Smoke is a temperamental thing, always wafting this way and that. Learn to control it, and you can control the battlefield."

attributes.name: Chromatic Flintlock
attributes.description: "Shiny."
attributes.parsed_description: "Shiny."

attributes.name: Cinder
attributes.description: "Know that, in this moment, you and the fire are as one."
attributes.parsed_description: "Know that, in this moment, you and the fire are as one."

attributes.name: Cinderforged Reaper
attributes.description: "Light the way."
attributes.parsed_description: "Light the way."

attributes.name: Ciradim, Charge of the Guardian
attributes.description: "The wooded serpent guarded Aeternum for eons. That charge now falls upon you."
attributes.parsed_description: "The wooded serpent guarded Aeternum for eons. That charge now falls upon you."

attributes.name: Ciradul, the Lazarine Warden
attributes.description: "The Lazarus pits are sacred to the Dryads. To defile them is sacrilege."
attributes.parsed_description: "The Lazarus pits are sacred to the Dryads. To defile them is sacrilege."

attributes.name: Clamorous Vox
attributes.description: Blaze a path forward with raw power and fury to rival a hurricane.
attributes.parsed_description: Blaze a path forward with raw power and fury to rival a hurricane.

attributes.name: Clean Conscious
attributes.description: "Killing never bothered me anyway."
attributes.parsed_description: "Killing never bothered me anyway."

attributes.name: Cleaveguard
attributes.description: “While corrupted forces constantly venture south, maintaining their stronghold in the Great Cleave is of the utmost importance to them.”
attributes.parsed_description: “While corrupted forces constantly venture south, maintaining their stronghold in the Great Cleave is of the utmost importance to them.”

attributes.name: Cloth Adorned Rapier
attributes.description: "Silk tendrils flow from the handle of the rapier. A beautiful weapon as elegant as it is precise."
attributes.parsed_description: "Silk tendrils flow from the handle of the rapier. A beautiful weapon as elegant as it is precise."

attributes.name: Coalesced Void Rapier
attributes.description: "The rapier appears to be a living organism formed from solidified void energy."
attributes.parsed_description: "The rapier appears to be a living organism formed from solidified void energy."

attributes.name: Cobra-headed Hatchet
attributes.description: "Strike first. Strike hard. No mercy."
attributes.parsed_description: "Strike first. Strike hard. No mercy."

attributes.name: Cobweb Cleaver
attributes.description: "Massive spiders leave massive webs and I do hate getting my hands dirty."
attributes.parsed_description: "Massive spiders leave massive webs and I do hate getting my hands dirty."

attributes.name: Cold-Blooded Killer
attributes.description: "Show no remorse."
attributes.parsed_description: "Show no remorse."

attributes.name: Cold Bore
attributes.description: "The first show is always the most meaningful."
attributes.parsed_description: "The first show is always the most meaningful."

attributes.name: Cold Forged Advantage
attributes.description: "Not everything is forged in heat. Some strength comes from the cold."
attributes.parsed_description: "Not everything is forged in heat. Some strength comes from the cold."

attributes.name: Cold Forged Advantage
attributes.description: "Not everything is forged in heat. Some strength comes from the cold."
attributes.parsed_description: "Not everything is forged in heat. Some strength comes from the cold."

attributes.name: Colossal Wood Axe
attributes.description: "A massive axe, hand crafted from enchanted wood."
attributes.parsed_description: "A massive axe, hand crafted from enchanted wood."

attributes.name: Comet's Light
attributes.description: "As you launch your arrow into the night sky, a steady light sits in its trail lighting your way."
attributes.parsed_description: "As you launch your arrow into the night sky, a steady light sits in its trail lighting your way."

attributes.name: Compulsion
attributes.description: "I cannot step away, I cannot turn my gaze. I will stand until I can stand no longer."
attributes.parsed_description: "I cannot step away, I cannot turn my gaze. I will stand until I can stand no longer."

attributes.name: Concubine
attributes.description: "While I love my wife and my children, my hatchet is my one true love."
attributes.parsed_description: "While I love my wife and my children, my hatchet is my one true love."

attributes.name: Conqueror's Mercy
attributes.description: "Know when to show strength, but also know when to show restraint."
attributes.parsed_description: "Know when to show strength, but also know when to show restraint."

attributes.name: Conqueror's Spear
attributes.description: "Shatter the walls and storm the keep, this city shall fall."
attributes.parsed_description: "Shatter the walls and storm the keep, this city shall fall."

attributes.name: Conquest
attributes.description: "We are constantly at war with the forces of the island, and yet we still find time to war against one another."
attributes.parsed_description: "We are constantly at war with the forces of the island, and yet we still find time to war against one another."

attributes.name: Consecrated Rapier
attributes.description: "Bless this blade, and guard whomever may wield it."
attributes.parsed_description: "Bless this blade, and guard whomever may wield it."

attributes.name: Consecrated Warhammer
attributes.description: "Formerly carried by a warrior who would rather wander the land and preach in the name of the Convenant instead of wield his hammer in battle. It seems one traveler didn't like this message and took it upon themselves to rid the warrior of his hammer."
attributes.parsed_description: "Formerly carried by a warrior who would rather wander the land and preach in the name of the Convenant instead of wield his hammer in battle. It seems one traveler didn't like this message and took it upon themselves to rid the warrior of his hammer."

attributes.name: Conservation of Heat
attributes.description: "The transformation of energy is not lost, but contained within the powers of this gauntlet."
attributes.parsed_description: "The transformation of energy is not lost, but contained within the powers of this gauntlet."

attributes.name: Constellation's Guide
attributes.description: "The stars are a vital part of our life. They guide us along our path, holding mysteries we do not yet understand."
attributes.parsed_description: "The stars are a vital part of our life. They guide us along our path, holding mysteries we do not yet understand."
